actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-699.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6191) to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for the United States Commission on Civil Rights for fiscal year ending September 30, 1983.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6191 (Civil Rights Commission funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6191) to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for the United States Commission on Civil Rights for fiscal year ending September 30, 1983.
